price: 8. Markaas ka dhigay tarankiisa miir biyo la liidsado.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿala naslahu min sulālatin min māin mahīnin
